original: Clase, Nils Oscar Albin, direktör, Göteborg, f. 15/5/93 i Gbg av gen:-konsul Gustaf C. o. Anna Löfwall. G. 21 m. Inga W-eijdüing. Barn: Bengt f. 22, Lars Magnus 27. — Efter stud. v. Gfcgs h. real stud. i Tyskl. o. Engl. Anst. v. Gustaf Clases Hand. A-B 12- 17, dir. i A-B Hugo Hallgrens Kon-servfabr. 17-43, verkst. dir. i A-B John Er. Andersson & Co. sed. 44. Led. av styr. f. A/S Gubbens Konser-vesfabr. i Danm., Marstrands Nya Ångf. A-B, A-B John Er. Andersson & Co. o. A-B Stenungsöns Havsbad.
translated: Clase, Nils Oscar Albin, director, Gothenburg, born May 15, 1893 in Gothenburg to consul Gustaf C. and Anna Löfwall. Married in 1921 to Inga W-eijdüing with two children: Bengt, born in 1922, and Lars Magnus, born in 1927. After studying at Gothenburg’s high school and real school, he studied in Germany and England. He was employed by Gustaf Clases Hand. A-B from 1912-1917, director of A-B Hugo Hallgrens Kon-servfabr. from 1917-1943, and executive director of A-B John Er. Andersson & Co. since 1944. He is a member of the boards of directors for A/S Gubbens Konser-vesfabr. in Denmark, Marstrands Nya Ångf. A-B, A-B John Er. Andersson & Co., and A-B Stenungsöns Havsbad.
